steps.title: Draw a circle and a large oblong attached to it.
steps.content: Draw a circle and a large oblong attached to it. The oblong should slightly overlap the circle.

steps.title: Draw the elephant’s trunk using curved lines and the ears using a wide inverted C shape.
steps.content: Draw the elephant’s trunk using curved lines and the ears using a wide inverted C shape.

steps.title: Draw the limbs using a set of parallel lines.
steps.content: Draw the limbs using a set of parallel lines.

steps.title: Add the eyes using a small circle and the eyebrows using small strokes.
steps.content: Add the eyes using a small circle and the eyebrows using small strokes. Add a large protruding tooth using a curved line and sketch a few strokes on the upper part of the elephant’s trunk.

steps.title: Draw the whole head and ears using your outline.
steps.content: Draw the whole head and ears using your outline.

steps.title: Sketch the body and limbs from the outline you have drawn earlier.
steps.content: Sketch the body and limbs from the outline you have drawn earlier.

steps.title: Add the tail using two curved lines and a few hairs at the ends of the tail.
steps.content: Add the tail using two curved lines and a few hairs at the ends of the tail. Draw the elephant’s nails using curved lines.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color your drawing.
steps.content: Color your drawing.

steps.title: Draw three circles interconnected with the other.
steps.content: Draw three circles interconnected with the other. Connect it with a membrane-like shape.

steps.title: Draw the elephant’s trunk on the first circle and a fan-like shape for the ears.
steps.content: Draw the elephant’s trunk on the first circle and a fan-like shape for the ears.

steps.title: Draw slanted lines that make up the limbs.
steps.content: Draw slanted lines that make up the limbs.

steps.title: Draw the eyes using curved strokes.
steps.content: Draw the eyes using curved strokes. Sketch a protruding tooth just beneath the tusk.

steps.title: Refine the details of the ears and tusk.
steps.content: Refine the details of the ears and tusk.

steps.title: Draw the whole body based on the outline you have drawn and add the tail.
steps.content: Draw the whole body based on the outline you have drawn and add the tail. Don’t forget to draw curved lines on each limb for the nails.

steps.title: Sketch short random strokes on the elephant’s body, especially to areas usually covered in shadow.
steps.content: Sketch short random strokes on the elephant’s body, especially to areas usually covered in shadow.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color your drawing.
steps.content: Color your drawing.

steps.title: Draw a medium-sized circle and add a big oval shape for the head.
steps.content: Draw a medium-sized circle and add a big oval shape for the head.

steps.title: Draw 2 arcs from the intersect of the circle and oval down and a wavy line at the bottom of the circle for the truck.
steps.content: Draw 2 arcs from the intersect of the circle and oval down and a wavy line at the bottom of the circle for the truck.

steps.title: Draw the elephant’s trunk and tusks.
steps.content: Draw the elephant’s trunk and tusks.

steps.title: Draw the ears of the elephant from the upper intersect of the oval and circle.
steps.content: Draw the ears of the elephant from the upper intersect of the oval and circle.

steps.title: Add the details of the elephant’s face.
steps.content: Add the details of the elephant’s face.

steps.title: Color your elephant.
steps.content: Color your elephant.

steps.title: Draw a medium-sized circle and add a big oval shape for the body.
steps.content: Draw a medium-sized circle and add a big oval shape for the body.

steps.title: Draw 2 pear-shaped ovals from the middle portion of the circle to the oval's mid-portion.
steps.content: Draw 2 pear-shaped ovals from the middle portion of the circle to the oval's mid-portion. This will be the ears of your elephant. This is ideal for baby elephants.

steps.title: Draw the eye of the elephant in the middle of the circle.
steps.content: Draw the eye of the elephant in the middle of the circle.

steps.title: Draw the elephant’s trunk and eyebrows.
steps.content: Draw the elephant’s trunk and eyebrows.

steps.title: Draw the half of the legs using “U” shaped lines to provide a framework.
steps.content: Draw the half of the legs using “U” shaped lines to provide a framework. The other half of the legs are more of a rounded square.

steps.title: Add details for the legs and draw the legs on the other side using the front leg as a guide.
steps.content: Add details for the legs and draw the legs on the other side using the front leg as a guide. Add the tail.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines and add small details to your liking.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines and add small details to your liking.

steps.title: Cartoon elephants can be any color.
steps.content: Cartoon elephants can be any color. Try out your favorite!
